pageTitle: Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder - Yu-Gi-Oh! - It's time to Duel!
title: Italian
textBeforeTable: English—Worldwide TCG sets Divine-Beast DIVINE This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by sending 3 Spell Cards you control to the Graveyard. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. While you control this face-up Defense Position card, other monsters you control cannot be selected as attack targets. If this Defense Position card is destroyed, you take no damage for the rest of this turn. English anime
